title: I was placed in lower priority queue due to not being able to connect to the game...
body: pls tell me I can't get in more trouble for what appears to be a client bug...

replies.body: Low priority queues are the result of a trend of disconnecting from matches. A client bug that causes you to disconnect from a match is pretty rare. If you provide me with a bit more detail about what behavior or error messages you see when your issue happens, I can give you the right actions to take in order to resolve this.

when i load into the game the screen stays black until I get a message saying that the game couldn't connect to the server. So i test my internet speed with with speedtest.net and i consistently get around 2-9 ms and 40 mbps. I also have not been having problems with other games, so i cant figure out what is causing this. Any help is appreciated because i don't want this to deteriorate any farther.

Speedtest is a great way to test if there are massive issues in your local network, but because each server is in a different physical locale, it's not effective to test if your connection to League is great. The symptoms you described are fairly typical to a common connection issue, so I recommend checking out our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps helped.
